text: Had an extremely pleasant experience. Counter was so nice.. set up apps for me to pay by scanning qr code in China.. N taught me, get me to practice n set up fingerprint.

Harrowing experience. Very long waiting time, account openings are prioritised so if your purpose is for anything else be prepared to have your queue number skipped many many times and wait. Very. Very. Long. Many seniors waited for more than 3 hours and were complaining. Counter staff not very efficient, esp compared with OCBC/ UOB.

Their phone service was bad and frontline was slow. The advantage is that their current account can start with $0 and no penalty through out as long per annum one transaction with account. I will close the account when FD matured. Nothing good that can hold me back from retaining account.
Unpleasant front line reception male staff. Could have shown more enthusiasm towards new customer. Poor body language and communication style
Counter staff Wang Ying was very patient and handled our account opening process well. Good job!
